title: Cumin roasted scallops with a salad of honey glazed chicken wings, apple, celeriac and hazelnuts
description: A gourmet way with chicken wings. This is an intricate dish but each part stands on its own so don't be afraid to try individual elements.
ingredients: 10 cornfed chicken wings, topped and tailed
1 banana shallot, peeled and finely chopped
salt and freshly ground black pepper
2 Granny Smith apples, peeled and finely chopped
12 scallops, removed from their shells, cleaned and roe removed
1 Granny Smith apple, cut into fine matchsticks
